name: Broom Eternal
description:
This game is a thrilling 8 player online FFA deathmatch where you must pick up Curling stones and throw them at the enemy while sliding around.

Now is your chance to assert your dominance over your friends by selecting the character you like the most, an exciting yet intriguing custom nickname and equip yourself with the mightiest broom.

(If Itch.Io doesn't let you run it) use this link: mantasruigys.com/game

Server IP: 178.62.91.41
